ITTIA DB SQL C++ API Reference  8.4.1
Overview

About the ITTIA DB SQL C++ API

The C++ API is an object-oriented interface for database applications linked with the ITTIA DB SQL library. Through the C++ API, an application has access to all features of ITTIA DB SQL, including database and schema creation, data manipulation with SQL or table cursors, client/server shared access, replication, and database maintenance.

The following example application demonstrates how to create and access a database with ITTIA DB SQL:

/**************************************************************************/
/* */
/* Copyright (c) 2005-2020 by ITTIA L.L.C. All rights reserved. */
/* */
/* This software is copyrighted by and is the sole property of ITTIA */
/* L.L.C. All rights, title, ownership, or other interests in the */
/* software remain the property of ITTIA L.L.C. This software may only */
/* be used in accordance with the corresponding license agreement. Any */
/* unauthorized use, duplication, transmission, distribution, or */
/* disclosure of this software is expressly forbidden. */
/* */
/* This Copyright notice may not be removed or modified without prior */
/* written consent of ITTIA L.L.C. */
/* */
/* ITTIA L.L.C. reserves the right to modify this software without */
/* notice. */
/* */
/* info@ittia.com */
/* http://www.ittia.com */
/* */
/* */
/**************************************************************************/
// A Hello World console program for ITTIA DB
#include <storage/data/environment.h>
#include <storage/ittiadb/connection.h>
#include <storage/ittiadb/transaction.h>
#include <storage/ittiadb/query.h>
#include <storage/data/row_set.h>
#include <storage/types/string_bind_traits.h>
#include <iostream>
using ::storage::data::Environment;
using ::storage::ittiadb::Connection;
using ::storage::ittiadb::Transaction;
using ::storage::ittiadb::Query;
using ::storage::data::RowSet;
static int example_main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
Connection database("hello_world.ittiadb");
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Create the Hello World database file
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
if (DB_OK != database.open(Connection::CreateAlways)) {
std::cout << "Unable to create database file, error "
<< Environment::error().name << "." << std::endl;
return 1;
}
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Create the hello_world table within the database
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
if (0 != Query(database,
"create table hello_world ("
" id integer,"
" message varchar(20))"
).execute())
{
std::cout << "Unable to create table, error "
<< Environment::error().name << "." << std::endl;
return 1;
}
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Start a transaction
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Transaction txn(database);
txn.begin();
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Insert "hello world" into the table.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
if (1 != Query(database,
"insert into hello_world values(0, 'hello world')"
).execute())
{
std::cout << "Unable to insert values into table, error "
<< Environment::error().name << "." << std::endl;
return 1;
}
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Execute the SQL query "select message from hello_world"
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
RowSet<> result_set;
if (DB_OK != Query(database,
"select message from hello_world"
).execute(result_set))
{
std::cout << "Unable to select from table, error "
<< Environment::error().name << "." << std::endl;
return 1;
}
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Iterate over the rows in the query result set
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
for (RowSet<>::const_iterator row = result_set.begin();
row != result_set.end();
++row)
{
//-------------------------------------------------------------------
// Retrieve the data from the cursor row
//-------------------------------------------------------------------
std::cout << row->at("message").to<std::string>() << std::endl;
}
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Commit to save changes and release locks
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
txn.commit();
return 0;
}
int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
int exit_code;
int status;
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Initialize ITTIA DB SQL library.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
status = Environment::init();
if (DB_SUCCESS(status)) {
db_api_statistics_t api_stats;
db_lm_statistics_t lm_stats;
#ifdef _DEBUG
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Enable collection of statistics.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Environment::get_api_statistics(NULL, DB_STATISTICS_ENABLE);
Environment::get_lm_statistics(NULL, DB_STATISTICS_ENABLE);
#endif
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Run the example application.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
exit_code = example_main(argc, argv);
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
// Release all resources owned by the ITTIA DB SQL library.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
status = Environment::done(NULL, &api_stats, &lm_stats);
if (DB_SUCCESS(status)) {
if (api_stats.have_statistics) {
std::cout << "ITTIA DB SQL final C API resource statistics:"
<< std::endl;
std::cout << " db: " << api_stats.db.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.db.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " row: " << api_stats.row.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.row.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " cursor: " << api_stats.cursor.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.cursor.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " seq: " << api_stats.seq.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.seq.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " seqdef: " << api_stats.seqdef.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.seqdef.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " tabledef:" << api_stats.tabledef.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.tabledef.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " indexdef:" << api_stats.indexdef.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.indexdef.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " oid: " << api_stats.oid.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << api_stats.oid.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
}
if (lm_stats.have_statistics) {
std::cout << "ITTIA DB SQL final lock manager resource statistics:"
<< std::endl;
std::cout << " nlocks: " << lm_stats.nlocks.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << lm_stats.nlocks.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " nowners: " << lm_stats.nowners.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << lm_stats.nowners.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
std::cout << " nobjects: " << lm_stats.nobjects.cur_value
<< " remain open of " << lm_stats.nobjects.max_value
<< " max" << std::endl;
}
}
}
if (DB_FAILED(status)) {
std::cerr << "ITTIA DB SQL init/done error: "<< status << std::endl;
exit_code = EXIT_FAILURE;
}
return exit_code;
}
DB_SUCCESS
#define DB_SUCCESS(x)
DB_FAILED
#define DB_FAILED(x)
db_statitem_t::max_value
db_counter_t max_value
db_statitem_t::cur_value
db_counter_t cur_value
db_api_statistics_t
db_api_statistics_t::have_statistics
int have_statistics
db_api_statistics_t::tabledef
db_statitem_t tabledef
db_api_statistics_t::seqdef
db_statitem_t seqdef
db_api_statistics_t::cursor
db_statitem_t cursor
db_api_statistics_t::db
db_statitem_t db
db_api_statistics_t::row
db_statitem_t row
db_api_statistics_t::seq
db_statitem_t seq
db_api_statistics_t::indexdef
db_statitem_t indexdef
db_api_statistics_t::oid
db_statitem_t oid
db_lm_statistics_t
db_lm_statistics_t::have_statistics
int have_statistics
db_lm_statistics_t::nlocks
db_statitem_t nlocks
db_lm_statistics_t::nobjects
db_statitem_t nobjects
db_lm_statistics_t::nowners
db_statitem_t nowners
